movie.title: Peacock
movie.description_intro: A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.
movie.description_full: A train accident in rural Nebraska gradually unveils a mystery involving the town's bank clerk.

movies.title: Frantic
movies.summary: A doctor and his wife go to Paris for a medical conference. While showering, his wife disappears. His lack of language, and the odd way she disappeared makes it nearly impossible for him to find any official help in his search as he enters the punk/drug culture to find out what has happened to her.
movies.description_full: A doctor and his wife go to Paris for a medical conference. While showering, his wife disappears. His lack of language, and the odd way she disappeared makes it nearly impossible for him to find any official help in his search as he enters the punk/drug culture to find out what has happened to her.

movies.title: Winter Sleep
movies.summary: Aydin, a former actor, runs a small hotel in central Anatolia with his young wife Nihal with whom he has a stormy relationship and his sister Necla who is suffering from her recent divorce. In winter as the snow begins to fall, the hotel turns into a shelter but also an inescapable place that fuels their animosities...

movies.title: The Secret Sex Life of a Single Mom
movies.title_english: The Secret Sex Life of a Single Mom
movies.title_long: The Secret Sex Life of a Single Mom (2014)
movies.summary: Mother of two, Delaine, divorces her verbally and emotionally abusive husband and realizes she's lost herself. Deciding to explore the world of online dating, she meets a dom who begins to teach her, through a myriad of sexual experiences, how to find the ambition, assertiveness, and sexual desire she'd been missing for so many years.
movies.description_full: Mother of two, Delaine, divorces her verbally and emotionally abusive husband and realizes she's lost herself. Deciding to explore the world of online dating, she meets a dom who begins to teach her, through a myriad of sexual experiences, how to find the ambition, assertiveness, and sexual desire she'd been missing for so many years.

movies.title: Claire's Camera
movies.summary: On a business trip to the Cannes Film Festival, Manhee is accused of being dishonest, and fired. A teacher named Claire goes around taking photos with a Polaroid camera. She gets to know Manhee and sympathizes with her. Claire is like a person who can see Manhee's possible future or past selves, through the mysterious power of the beach tunnel. Through taking photos, Claire has acquired the ability to look slowly at things, and to transform objects. Now, Claire goes with Manhee to the café where she was fired. We look forward to seeing Claire's power at work.
